name: GunDrill Demo
description:
Thanks for checking out our demo for GunDrill! We'd love to be able to make the full game, and hopefully this demo gives a taste of what the full experience could be like.

Controls: 
Movement - WASD + Space
Arrow keys for drill, double tap arrow keys for shoot

If you enjoyed this demo, follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GunDrill_

The original soundtrack is available to buy on Bandcamp and stream on your favorite streaming service: https://brianmowat.bandcamp.com/releases

Code and design: @Cogh_

Music,  sound, and design: @Brian_Mowat

Art: @schultz1417
